alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:32PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wakefield VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Mattaponi River at Bowling Green affecting Caroline County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible by later tonight. * WHERE...Mattaponi River at Bowling Green. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...River levels are rising this evening. Based on current trends, levels may approach minor flood thresholds tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 12/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 945 AM EST.
